Yummy carrot cake and pineapple upside down cake!!I really enjoy the ambiance that they set in this simple bakery/café.  It's small but full of character.  According to the owner, the selection of goodies changes on a daily basis.  So you'll never really know what you'll get.  But the carrot cake seems to be a staple.  I understand why, it's incredible!I'm addicted!
